types.html:
faire le coup

  1. (informal) to use the … technique, to use the old … trick
    faire le coup de la panne ― to try the "I've run out of petrol" routine, to play the "broken-down car" trick, to pretend to break down
    Il m'a encore fait le coup ! ― (please add an English translation of this usage example)

Usage notes

[edit]
  • Generally used with a complement introduced by de.
trans: to use the … technique, to use the old … trick

title: faire le coup
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /fɛʁ lə ku/
